column4: The offending file is http://ppa.launchpad.net/ubuntu-x-swat/x-updates/ubuntu/pool/main/n/nvidia-graphics-drivers/nvidia-current_280.13-0ubuntu1~maverick~xup1_amd64.deb
I've tried manually with wget and axel but no luck with either
The error I get is "Connection failed"
Please check your internet connection
Yup.
Even axel gives up on this archive.
atalls->stalls
I can update my system but unfortunately that package is the latest nVIDIA driver, which is a crucial part of the update...
That's what troubles me. Why should wget or even axel stall midway on a package?
Anyone here can test download this package to see if it is not a connection problem at my ISP or somehing?
I'm not having any issues downloading that here.
You've got the *whole* ~55 MB thing?
yes.
Can you upload that archive to mediafire or someplace please?
I'll pm you a link.
I didn't receive any link yet...
I pmed it to you. Check your other windows.
Just post the thing here please...
I'd perfer not to, it is on my personal web server.
send me a private message then and I'll respond.
OK. Wait sometime. Thanks
